chapter.keywords: online king james holy bible, king james bible, bible todo list, words of Jesus, bible index, the authorised version, KJV, KJB, KJAV, AV

items.text: The LORD said unto my Lord, Sit thou at my right hand, until I make thine enemies thy footstool.
items.plainText: The LORD said unto my Lord, Sit thou at my right hand, until I make thine enemies thy footstool.

items.text: The LORD shall send the rod of thy strength out of Zion: rule thou in the midst of thine enemies.
items.plainText: The LORD shall send the rod of thy strength out of Zion: rule thou in the midst of thine enemies.

items.text: Thy people shall be willing in the day of thy power, in the beauties of holiness from the womb of the morning: thou hast the dew of thy youth.
items.plainText: Thy people shall be willing in the day of thy power, in the beauties of holiness from the womb of the morning: thou hast the dew of thy youth.

items.text: The LORD hath sworn, and will not repent, Thou art a priest for ever after the order of Melchizedek.
items.plainText: The LORD hath sworn, and will not repent, Thou art a priest for ever after the order of Melchizedek.

items.text: The Lord at thy right hand shall strike through kings in the day of his wrath.
items.plainText: The Lord at thy right hand shall strike through kings in the day of his wrath.

items.text: He shall judge among the heathen, he shall fill the places with the dead bodies; he shall wound the heads over many countries.
items.plainText: He shall judge among the heathen, he shall fill the places with the dead bodies; he shall wound the heads over many countries.

items.text: He shall drink of the brook in the way: therefore shall he lift up the head.
items.plainText: He shall drink of the brook in the way: therefore shall he lift up the head.
